title: 96/2/EC: Commission Decision of 12 December 1995 amending Decision 94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 December 1995 amending Decision 94/85/EC drawing up a list of third countries from which the Member States authorize imports of fresh poultrymeat (Text with EEA relevance) (96/2/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In the Annex to Commission Decision 94/85/EC the following line is inserted in accordance with the alphabetic order of the ISO-code:
'>TABLE>
`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 35.
(2) OJ No L 340, 31. 12. 1993, p. 39.
(3) OJ No L 44, 17. 2. 1994, p. 31.
(4) OJ No L 119, 30. 5. 1995, p. 34.
